# Government Tender Announcement: Professional Audit Support Services (PASS)
### Tender ID: cb-7925-71889607

### Tender Description:

Citizenship and Immigration Canada (CIC) is seeking to establish contracts with up to two (2) bidders per stream for the provision of audit services under the Professional Audit Support Services (PASS) Supply Arrangement. The successful contractors will provide internal audit, assurance and consulting services to the Internal Audit and Accountability Branch (IAAB) of CIC.

The audit services will be performed under the following streams:

* **Stream 1: Internal Audit Services**: Supporting the IAAB in the conduct of internal audits and risk-based assurance activities
* **Stream 3: Information Technology and Systems Audits**: Conducting audits of CIC’s information technology and systems to identify potential risks and improve controls

### Tender Details

* **Tender Reference Number:** cb-7925-71889607
* **Amendment Number:** 1
* **Solicitation Number:** CIC-155832
* **Publication Date:** August 8, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date and Time:** August 22, 2023, 14:00:00 (EST)
* **Contract Start Date:** October 31, 2023
* **Contract End Date:** October 31, 2026

### Trade Agreements

This tender is covered under the following trade agreements:

* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

### Additional Information

For further information, please visit the tender notice on the Canada Buy website at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca](https://canadabuys.canada.ca). The tender documents, including the tender notice and invitation to bid, are available in English and French.
